pullRequest.title: [neohub] added support for Fahrenheit, new accessory devices, and low battery alarm
pullRequest.bodyText:
Previously all temperatures were assumed to be in Celsius, so always created the Quantity values using SIUnits.CELSIUS
The binding now reads the "C-or-F" parameter from the NeoHub (C-or-F indicates if temperatures are being sent in Celsius or Fahrenheit), and now it creates the Quantity values using either SIUnits.CELSIUS or ImperialUnits.FAHRENHEIT respectively..
Also added support for remote (wireless) door/window contacts, remote (wireless) temperature sensors, and (therefore) support for the low battery alarm.
